<script type="module">
import * as THREE from 'https://unpkg.com/three@0.164.1/build/three.module.js';
import { OrbitControls } from 'https://unpkg.com/three@0.164.1/examples/jsm/controls/OrbitControls.js';
import { EffectComposer } from 'https://unpkg.com/three@0.164.1/examples/jsm/postprocessing/EffectComposer.js';
import { RenderPass } from 'https://unpkg.com/three@0.164.1/examples/jsm/postprocessing/RenderPass.js';
import { UnrealBloomPass } from 'https://unpkg.com/three@0.164.1/examples/jsm/postprocessing/UnrealBloomPass.js';

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  document.body.classList.add('drive-page');

  const canvas = document.getElementById('drive-canvas');
  const speedEl = document.querySelector('[data-speed]');
  const boostEl = document.querySelector('[data-boost]');
  const boostFill = document.querySelector('[data-boost-fill]');

  const renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ canvas, antialias: true });
  renderer.setPixelRatio(Math.min(window.devicePixelRatio, 2));
  renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
  renderer.shadowMap.enabled = true;
  renderer.shadowMap.type = THREE.PCFSoftShadowMap;
  renderer.outputColorSpace = THREE.SRGBColorSpace;
  renderer.toneMapping = THREE.ACESFilmicToneMapping;
  renderer.toneMappingExposure = 1.05;

  const scene = new THREE.Scene();
  scene.background = new THREE.Color(0x06070f);
  scene.fog = new THREE.FogExp2(0x06070f, 0.03);

  const camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(60, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 0.1, 200);
  camera.position.set(0, 6, 10);

  const controls = new OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement);
  controls.enableDamping = true;
  controls.enabled = false;
  controls.minDistance = 4;
  controls.maxDistance = 40;
  controls.maxPolarAngle = Math.PI / 2.1;

  const composer = new EffectComposer(renderer);
  composer.addPass(new RenderPass(scene, camera));
  const bloom = new UnrealBloomPass(new THREE.Vector2(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight), 0.8, 0.9, 0.75);
  composer.addPass(bloom);

  const hemi = new THREE.HemisphereLight(0x8fbaff, 0x07070c, 1.05);
  hemi.position.set(0, 30, 0);
  scene.add(hemi);

  const sun = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 1.35);
  sun.position.set(12, 18, 8);
  sun.castShadow = true;
  sun.shadow.mapSize.set(1024, 1024);
  sun.shadow.camera.near = 1;
  sun.shadow.camera.far = 50;
  scene.add(sun);

  const accentCyan = new THREE.PointLight(0x53e7ff, 2.2, 70, 2);
  accentCyan.position.set(18, 6, -18);
  scene.add(accentCyan);

  const accentPink = new THREE.PointLight(0xff6b9a, 1.8, 70, 2);
  accentPink.position.set(-18, 5, 16);
  scene.add(accentPink);

  const sky = new THREE.Mesh(
    new THREE.SphereGeometry(120, 32, 32),
    new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ map: makeSkyTexture(), side: THREE.BackSide })
  );
  scene.add(sky);

  const gridTexture = makeGridTexture();
  gridTexture.wrapS = gridTexture.wrapT = THREE.RepeatWrapping;
  gridTexture.repeat.set(12, 12);

  const groundMat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
    color: 0x0a0c18,
    roughness: 0.92,
    metalness: 0.04,
    emissive: new THREE.Color('#0a1230'),
    emissiveIntensity: 0.25,
    map: gridTexture,
  });

  const ground = new THREE.Mesh(
    new THREE.PlaneGeometry(80, 80),
    groundMat
  );
  ground.receiveShadow = true;
  ground.rotation.x = -Math.PI / 2;
  scene.add(ground);

  const neonPadMat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
    color: new THREE.Color('#2cf0c8'),
    emissive: new THREE.Color('#2cf0c8'),
    emissiveIntensity: 0.9,
    roughness: 0.25,
    metalness: 0.55,
  });

  const neonPad = new THREE.Mesh(
    new THREE.BoxGeometry(4, 0.05, 16),
    neonPadMat
  );
  neonPad.position.set(0, 0.03, -2);
  neonPad.receiveShadow = true;
  scene.add(neonPad);

  const rimGeo = new THREE.TorusGeometry(4.3, 0.07, 20, 100);
  const rim = new THREE.Mesh(
    rimGeo,
    new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0x5dd6ff, transparent: true, opacity: 0.32 })
  );
  rim.rotation.x = Math.PI / 2;
  rim.position.y = 0.1;
  scene.add(rim);

  const beam = new THREE.Mesh(
    new THREE.CylinderGeometry(1.8, 3.2, 8, 24, 1, true),
    new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
      color: 0x2cf0c8,
      transparent: true,
      opacity: 0.12,
      blending: THREE.AdditiveBlending,
      side: THREE.DoubleSide,
      depthWrite: false,
    })
  );
  beam.position.set(0, 4, -2);
  scene.add(beam);

  const walls = new THREE.Group();
  const wallMat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
    color: 0x14182a,
    roughness: 0.35,
    metalness: 0.25,
    emissive: 0x05070f,
    emissiveIntensity: 0.12,
  });
  const wallGeo = new THREE.BoxGeometry(80, 1.6, 0.4);
  const wall1 = new THREE.Mesh(wallGeo, wallMat);
  wall1.position.set(0, 0.8, -40);
  const wall2 = wall1.clone();
  wall2.position.set(0, 0.8, 40);
  const wallSideGeo = new THREE.BoxGeometry(0.4, 1.6, 80);
  const wall3 = new THREE.Mesh(wallSideGeo, wallMat);
  wall3.position.set(-40, 0.8, 0);
  const wall4 = wall3.clone();
  wall4.position.set(40, 0.8, 0);
  [wall1, wall2, wall3, wall4].forEach(w => {
    w.castShadow = true;
    w.receiveShadow = true;
    walls.add(w);
  });
  scene.add(walls);

  const car = buildCar();
  scene.add(car);

  const decoGroup = new THREE.Group();
  scene.add(decoGroup);

  sprinkleDeco(decoGroup);

  const particles = makeDust();
  scene.add(particles);

  const clock = new THREE.Clock();
  let speed = 0;
  let heading = 0;
  let boost = 1;
  let boosting = false;
  const bounds = 38;

  const input = {
    forward: false,
    back: false,
    left: false,
    right: false,
    brake: false,
    boost: false,
  };

  function onKey(e, down) {
    const key = e.code;
    if (['KeyW', 'ArrowUp', 'KeyS', 'ArrowDown', 'KeyA', 'ArrowLeft', 'KeyD', 'ArrowRight', 'Space', 'ShiftLeft', 'ShiftRight', 'KeyR', 'KeyO'].includes(key)) {
      e.preventDefault();
    }
    if (key === 'KeyW' || key === 'ArrowUp') input.forward = down;
    if (key === 'KeyS' || key === 'ArrowDown') input.back = down;
    if (key === 'KeyA' || key === 'ArrowLeft') input.left = down;
    if (key === 'KeyD' || key === 'ArrowRight') input.right = down;
    if (key === 'Space') input.brake = down;
    if (key === 'ShiftLeft' || key === 'ShiftRight') input.boost = down;
    if (key === 'KeyR' && down) resetCar();
    if (key === 'KeyO' && down) controls.enabled = !controls.enabled;
  }

  window.addEventListener('keydown', e => onKey(e, true));
  window.addEventListener('keyup', e => onKey(e, false));
  window.addEventListener('blur', () => {
    Object.keys(input).forEach(k => (input[k] = false));
  });

  function resetCar() {
    car.position.set(0, 0.7, 2);
    speed = 0;
    heading = Math.PI;
  }

  function updatePhysics(dt) {
    const onPad = Math.abs(car.position.x) < 2 && Math.abs(car.position.z + 2) < 8;
    boosting = input.boost && boost > 0.02;
    const accel = boosting ? 22 : 16;
    const maxSpeed = boosting ? 18 : 12;

    speed += (input.forward ? 1 : 0) * accel * dt;
    speed -= (input.back ? 1 : 0) * accel * dt;
    speed = THREE.MathUtils.clamp(speed, -maxSpeed * 0.5, maxSpeed);
    speed *= input.brake ? 0.88 : 0.96;

    const steerFactor = (Math.abs(speed) / maxSpeed) * 0.6 + 0.25;
    heading += (input.left ? 1 : 0) * steerFactor * dt * 3.2;
    heading -= (input.right ? 1 : 0) * steerFactor * dt * 3.2;

    const forward = new THREE.Vector3(Math.sin(heading), 0, Math.cos(heading));
    car.position.addScaledVector(forward, speed * dt);
    car.rotation.y = heading + Math.PI;

    // Boundary bounce
    if (car.position.x > bounds || car.position.x < -bounds) {
      car.position.x = THREE.MathUtils.clamp(car.position.x, -bounds, bounds);
      speed *= -0.35;
    }
    if (car.position.z > bounds || car.position.z < -bounds) {
      car.position.z = THREE.MathUtils.clamp(car.position.z, -bounds, bounds);
      speed *= -0.35;
    }

    // Slight auto-level
    car.position.y = THREE.MathUtils.lerp(car.position.y, 0.7, 0.1);
    car.rotation.z = THREE.MathUtils.lerp(car.rotation.z, -Math.sin(heading) * 0.05 * (speed / maxSpeed), 0.08);

    // Boost energy (charges faster on neon pad)
    if (boosting) {
      boost = Math.max(0, boost - dt * 0.42);
    } else {
      const recharge = onPad ? 0.85 : 0.22;
      boost = Math.min(1, boost + dt * recharge);
    }

    // Visual feedback for boost
    if (car.userData.bodyMat) {
      car.userData.bodyMat.emissiveIntensity = THREE.MathUtils.lerp(
        car.userData.bodyMat.emissiveIntensity,
        boosting ? 0.25 : 0.08,
        0.12
      );
    }
    if (car.userData.underGlow) {
      const glowMat = car.userData.underGlow.material;
      glowMat.opacity = THREE.MathUtils.lerp(glowMat.opacity, boosting ? 0.55 : 0.25, 0.12);
    }
  }

  function updateCamera(dt) {
    const offset = new THREE.Vector3(0, 4.5, 8);
    offset.applyAxisAngle(new THREE.Vector3(0, 1, 0), heading);
    const desired = car.position.clone().add(offset);
    camera.position.lerp(desired, 1 - Math.pow(0.92, dt * 60));
    const lookTarget = car.position.clone().add(new THREE.Vector3(0, 0.9, 0));
    if (!controls.enabled) {
      camera.lookAt(lookTarget);
    } else {
      controls.target.lerp(lookTarget, 1 - Math.pow(0.9, dt * 60));
      controls.update();
    }
  }

  function updateHUD() {
    const kmh = Math.abs(speed) * 12;
    speedEl.textContent = `${kmh.toFixed(0)} km/h`;
    const pct = Math.round(boost * 100);
    boostEl.textContent = `${pct}%`;
    boostFill.style.transform = `scaleX(${boost.toFixed(3)})`;
    boostFill.style.filter = boosting ? 'saturate(1.4)' : 'saturate(1)';
  }

  function animate() {
    const dt = Math.min(0.05, clock.getDelta());
    const t = performance.now() * 0.001;
    updatePhysics(dt);
    updateCamera(dt);
    updateDeco(dt);
    particles.rotation.y += dt * 0.08;

    // Grid flow and pad pulse
    const flow = speed * dt * 0.01;
    gridTexture.offset.x = THREE.MathUtils.euclideanModulo(gridTexture.offset.x + flow, 1);
    gridTexture.offset.y = THREE.MathUtils.euclideanModulo(gridTexture.offset.y + flow * 0.7, 1);

    neonPadMat.emissiveIntensity = 0.75 + Math.sin(t * 2.2) * 0.2 + (boosting ? 0.18 : 0);
    rim.rotation.z += dt * 0.5;
    rim.material.opacity = 0.24 + Math.sin(t * 1.6) * 0.08;
    beam.rotation.y += dt * 0.15;
    beam.material.opacity = 0.08 + Math.sin(t * 1.3) * 0.04;

    updateHUD();
    composer.render();
    requestAnimationFrame(animate);
  }

  function onResize() {
    const w = window.innerWidth;
    const h = window.innerHeight;
    camera.aspect = w / h;
    camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
    renderer.setSize(w, h);
    composer.setSize(w, h);
    bloom.setSize(w, h);
  }

  window.addEventListener('resize', onResize);

  resetCar();
  animate();

  // Helper factories
  function makeGridTexture() {
    const size = 512;
    const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
    canvas.width = canvas.height = size;
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    const gradient = ctx.createRadialGradient(size / 2, size / 2, 0, size / 2, size / 2, size / 1.4);
    gradient.addColorStop(0, '#11182a');
    gradient.addColorStop(1, '#05060c');
    ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, size, size);

    // subtle grain
    for (let i = 0; i < 2600; i++) {
      const x = Math.random() * size;
      const y = Math.random() * size;
      const a = Math.random() * 0.06;
      ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(255,255,255,${a})`;
      ctx.fillRect(x, y, 1, 1);
    }

    const step = size / 16;
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255,255,255,0.035)';
    for (let i = 0; i <= size; i += step) {
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(i, 0);
      ctx.lineTo(i, size);
      ctx.stroke();
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(0, i);
      ctx.lineTo(size, i);
      ctx.stroke();
    }

    ctx.lineWidth = 3;
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(44,240,200,0.09)';
    const major = step * 4;
    for (let i = 0; i <= size; i += major) {
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(i, 0);
      ctx.lineTo(i, size);
      ctx.stroke();
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(0, i);
      ctx.lineTo(size, i);
      ctx.stroke();
    }

    const tex = new THREE.CanvasTexture(canvas);
    tex.anisotropy = renderer.capabilities.getMaxAnisotropy();
    return tex;
  }

	  function makeSkyTexture() {
	    const h = 512;
	    const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
	    canvas.width = 512;
	    canvas.height = h;
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    const grad = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 0, h);
    grad.addColorStop(0, '#14143a');
    grad.addColorStop(0.5, '#070a1d');
    grad.addColorStop(1, '#020308');
    ctx.fillStyle = grad;
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, h);

    // stars
    for (let i = 0; i < 220; i++) {
      const x = Math.random() * canvas.width;
      const y = Math.random() * h;
      const r = Math.random() * 1.2 + 0.2;
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(180,220,255,${Math.random() * 0.8})`;
      ctx.arc(x, y, r, 0, Math.PI * 2);
      ctx.fill();
    }
	    const tex = new THREE.CanvasTexture(canvas);
	    tex.wrapS = THREE.RepeatWrapping;
	    tex.wrapT = THREE.ClampToEdgeWrapping;
	    return tex;
	  }

  function buildCar() {
    const car = new THREE.Group();

    const bodyMat = new THREE.MeshPhysicalMaterial({
      color: new THREE.Color('#7fe7d1'),
      metalness: 0.85,
      roughness: 0.25,
      clearcoat: 0.8,
      clearcoatRoughness: 0.15,
      emissive: new THREE.Color('#0b2a25'),
      emissiveIntensity: 0.12,
    });
    const shell = new THREE.Mesh(new THREE.BoxGeometry(1.55, 0.55, 3.05), bodyMat);
    shell.castShadow = true;
    shell.receiveShadow = true;
    shell.position.y = 0.55;
    car.add(shell);

    const cabin = new THREE.Mesh(
      new THREE.BoxGeometry(1.1, 0.45, 1.2),
      new THREE.MeshPhysicalMaterial({
        color: 0x121526,
        metalness: 0.4,
        roughness: 0.08,
        transmission: 0.1,
        emissive: 0x1c90ff,
        emissiveIntensity: 0.45,
      })
    );
    cabin.position.set(0, 0.9, -0.2);
    cabin.castShadow = true;
    car.add(cabin);

    const wheelGeo = new THREE.CylinderGeometry(0.32, 0.32, 0.24, 18);
    wheelGeo.rotateZ(Math.PI / 2);
    const wheelMat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({ color: 0x07070a, roughness: 0.9, metalness: 0.05 });
    const positions = [
      [0.65, 0.25, 1.2],
      [-0.65, 0.25, 1.2],
      [0.65, 0.25, -1.2],
      [-0.65, 0.25, -1.2],
    ];
    positions.forEach(p => {
      const w = new THREE.Mesh(wheelGeo, wheelMat);
      w.position.set(p[0], p[1], p[2]);
      w.castShadow = true;
      car.add(w);
    });

    const glowBar = new THREE.Mesh(
      new THREE.BoxGeometry(1.4, 0.12, 0.18),
      new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
        color: 0x2cf0c8,
        emissive: 0x2cf0c8,
        emissiveIntensity: 1.0,
        roughness: 0.15,
      })
    );
    glowBar.position.set(0, 0.42, 1.55);
    car.add(glowBar);

    const tail = glowBar.clone();
    tail.position.set(0, 0.42, -1.55);
    tail.material = glowBar.material.clone();
    tail.material.color.set(0xff6b9a);
    tail.material.emissive.set(0xff6b9a);
    car.add(tail);

    car.userData.bodyMat = bodyMat;

    const underGlow = new THREE.Mesh(
      new THREE.CircleGeometry(1.5, 40),
      new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
        color: 0x2cf0c8,
        transparent: true,
        opacity: 0.3,
        blending: THREE.AdditiveBlending,
        side: THREE.DoubleSide,
        depthWrite: false,
      })
    );
    underGlow.rotation.x = -Math.PI / 2;
    underGlow.position.y = 0.05;
    car.add(underGlow);
    car.userData.underGlow = underGlow;

    const headLightMat = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ color: 0x9be7ff });
    const headGeo = new THREE.BoxGeometry(0.18, 0.08, 0.05);
    const hl1 = new THREE.Mesh(headGeo, headLightMat);
    hl1.position.set(0.45, 0.55, 1.55);
    const hl2 = hl1.clone();
    hl2.position.x = -0.45;
    car.add(hl1, hl2);

    car.position.set(0, 0.7, 2);
    return car;
  }

  function sprinkleDeco(group) {
    const geom = new THREE.IcosahedronGeometry(0.5, 0);
    const mat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
      color: 0x4fb7ff,
      emissive: 0x4fb7ff,
      emissiveIntensity: 0.5,
      metalness: 0.4,
      roughness: 0.25,
    });
    for (let i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
      const m = new THREE.Mesh(geom, mat.clone());
      m.position.set(
        THREE.MathUtils.randFloatSpread(60),
        THREE.MathUtils.randFloat(0.2, 1.8),
        THREE.MathUtils.randFloatSpread(60)
      );
      m.scale.setScalar(THREE.MathUtils.randFloat(0.5, 1.6));
      m.userData.floatPhase = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
      m.userData.floatAmp = THREE.MathUtils.randFloat(0.02, 0.06);
      m.userData.baseY = m.position.y;
      m.userData.pulseBase = 0.35;
      m.userData.pulseAmp = 0.15;
      m.userData.pulseSpeed = THREE.MathUtils.randFloat(1.2, 2.1);
      m.castShadow = true;
      group.add(m);
    }
    const ringMat = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
      color: 0x6bf0ff,
      emissive: 0x6bf0ff,
      emissiveIntensity: 0.4,
      roughness: 0.2,
      metalness: 0.6,
      side: THREE.DoubleSide,
      transparent: true,
      opacity: 0.7,
    });
    for (let i = 0; i < 14; i++) {
      const torus = new THREE.Mesh(
        new THREE.TorusGeometry(THREE.MathUtils.randFloat(0.6, 1.2), 0.04, 12, 50),
        ringMat.clone()
      );
      torus.position.set(
        THREE.MathUtils.randFloatSpread(60),
        THREE.MathUtils.randFloat(0.6, 1.4),
        THREE.MathUtils.randFloatSpread(60)
      );
      torus.rotation.x = Math.random() * Math.PI;
      torus.rotation.y = Math.random() * Math.PI;
      torus.userData.pulseBase = 0.25;
      torus.userData.pulseAmp = 0.12;
      torus.userData.pulseSpeed = THREE.MathUtils.randFloat(0.8, 1.6);
      group.add(torus);
    }
  }

  function updateDeco(dt) {
    const t = performance.now() * 0.001;
    decoGroup.children.forEach((c, idx) => {
      c.rotation.x += 0.2 * dt;
      c.rotation.y += 0.35 * dt;
      if (c.userData.floatPhase !== undefined) {
        c.position.y = c.userData.baseY + Math.sin(t + c.userData.floatPhase) * c.userData.floatAmp;
      }
      if (c.userData.pulseBase !== undefined && c.material?.emissive) {
        const speed = c.userData.pulseSpeed ?? 1.4;
        c.material.emissiveIntensity =
          c.userData.pulseBase + Math.sin(t * speed + idx) * c.userData.pulseAmp;
      }
    });
  }

  function makeDust() {
    const geo = new THREE.BufferGeometry();
    const count = 1800;
    const positions = new Float32Array(count * 3);
    for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
      positions[i * 3] = THREE.MathUtils.randFloatSpread(80);
      positions[i * 3 + 1] = Math.random() * 6 + 0.2;
      positions[i * 3 + 2] = THREE.MathUtils.randFloatSpread(80);
    }
    geo.setAttribute('position', new THREE.BufferAttribute(positions, 3));
    const mat = new THREE.PointsMaterial({
      size: 0.05,
      color: 0x7fffd4,
      transparent: true,
      opacity: 0.7,
      depthWrite: false,
    });
    return new THREE.Points(geo, mat);
  }
});
</script>
